title: Responsibility for deposits
context: ยง431:7-307 Responsibility for deposits. This State shall be responsible for the safekeeping and return of all funds and securities deposited pursuant to section 431:7-301 to section [431:7-311] with the director of finance. The insurer shall be responsible for the safekeeping and return of all funds and securities deposited pursuant to section 431:7-306. [L 1987, c 347, pt of ยง2]
